level.text: The two ex officio Trustees acting hereunder may resign at any time by giving written notice to the Mayor. The other nine (9) Trustees hereunder may resign at any time by giving written notice to the Mayor and the Council.

Any officer or Trust member who engages in misconduct or fails to perform the duties of a Trust member may be removed from office or membership by the Trust upon a recommendation from the Executive Committee and ratification by seven (7) or more members of the Trust; provided, that he or she shall first be presented with written charges and given a reasonable opportunity to be heard before the Trust. The decision of the seven (7) or more ratifying Trust members shall be final.
